label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_021
content:
## 2024-07-22 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 128
- Active: 121
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 34
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 7

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 31
- Mid Dose: 31
- High Dose: 33
- Placebo: 33

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 58.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 17.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 96.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 158.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 102.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 27.6
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 99.0
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 28.8
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 154.1
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 235.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 171.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 40.5
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 133.7
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 44.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 219.7
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 334.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 227.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 58.0
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 14.9
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 15.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 36.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 13.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 6.8

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 43.2
- Erythema Percentage: 28.9
- Swelling Percentage: 19.6
- Induration Percentage: 3.6
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 21.8

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 21.8
- Fatigue Percentage: 20.5
- Myalgia Percentage: 23.5
- Headache Percentage: 15.2
- Chills Percentage: 12.5

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 6.2
- WBC (K) SD: 1.6
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 27.0
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 5.2
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 52.2
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 8.2
- Platelets (K) Mean: 242
- Platelets (K) SD: 41
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 3.1
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.2

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2166
  - Description: Myalgia
  - Grade: 2
  - Relatedness: Related
  - Resolved: True
  - Dose Group: Low Dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2141
  - Description: Malaise
  - Grade: 1
  - Relatedness: Related
  - Resolved: True
  - Dose Group: Mid Dose

### Events
- Vaccine lot VX-877 temperature excursion assessed: within acceptable range
- Reactogenicity diary card collection rate: 96%
- Vaccination day 1: 25 subjects received scheduled dose

### Notes
- Week 21: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 128 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
